title: The Black Rose
description: Welcome to hell! To the place where hope is only a word...until now.Julie's soul is white and the most valuable thing in hell, because it spreads hope and everyone will fight to have her. Not to mention, her heart is beating, because a person, who dared to steal her from the land of living, did a small mistake. Why has he kidnapped her? Because she is what he wanted all his existence, and he is about to force her to fall in love with him.Will she find the way to escape the possessive Master or will she give her heart to him?
author: Serafina Daniel
